import React from "react"; import Navbar from "components/Navbar.js"; // import FooterSmall from "components/FooterSmall.js"; class Signup extends React.Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { username: '', email: '', password: '' } } handletextInput = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } handleSubmit = () => { const {username, email, password} = this.state; console.log(username, email, password); fetch('http://localhost:9000/signup') .then(res => res.text()) .then(res => this.setState({username: res})) } render() { return ( <>
